details.purpose: For recording the findings on inspection of the tympanic membrane
details.use: For use with the exam clusters for recording findings on inspection of the tmpanic membrane
details.misuse: Should only be used in the exam observation

items.items: How good is the view of the membrane?
The general appearance of the tympanic membrane
Description of any middle ear structure visible
The status of any grommet inserted
Details of any ventilation tube inserted
Degree of retraction of the TM
Text Description of the appearance of the drum
Degree of tympanic membrane retraction (Sade classification)
TM slighly retracted i.e tothe level of the annualt ligament
reaches the level of the promontory
TM reaches the promontory without adhering to it
TM reaches the promontory and adheres to it
Is a fluid level visible behind the membrane?
The findings on physical examination by inspection
The findings on physical examination by inspection of the tympanic membrane
An optional group of statements about the normality of the inspection
A specific statement about the normality of inspection
The shape or distribution of the object inspected
Description of the location of the findings
Description of immediate surrounds to object
Findings about the edge of the object under inspection
The nature of the edge of the object of examination
The edge is defined but less clear in places
The edge is not defined clearly in many places
Description of the edge or border of the object of inspection
Is the object of inspection translucent?
The colour of the object under inspection
Clinical description of the findings on inspection
Detailed examination of a finding on inspection
An image of the findings on inspection - drawing, photo or video
The contour of the object of inspection
